infra

Class Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • infra.Parameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class containing a set of parameters to be saved and retrieved from one to other run.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int baudRate 
      java.lang.String portaSerial
      The list of parameters to be saved.

    • Field Detail

      • portaSerial

        public java.lang.String portaSerial
        The list of parameters to be saved. It is a good idea to set a initial value to each one of them. These values will be used whether those ones that were saved last time are lost.

      • baudRate

        public int baudRate

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parameters

        public Parameters()

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public boolean save(java.lang.String fileName)
        Allows to save the parameters in a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the complete path with the file name
        Returns:
        true if everything is OK

      • retrieve

        public static Parameters retrieve(java.lang.String fileName)
        Allows to retrieve the parameters saved in a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the complete path with the file name
        Returns:
        the previously stored parameters

      • calc

        public static void calc()
        This method should be called after retrieving of parameters from a file or after some change. The idea is to keep consistence among the values and units.
